The Role of Universities in Economic Development </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMY-SUSTAINABILITY;65ff8c4f.1501</link>   <description> Dear ACADEMY-SUSTAINABILITY subscribers,<br><br>We hope you find this title of interest.<br><br>[The Fountain of Knowledge]&lt;http://www.combinedacademic.co.uk/the-fountain-of-knowledge&gt;The Fountain of Knowledge&lt;http://www.combinedacademic.co.uk/the-fountain-of-knowledge&gt;<br><br>The Role of Universities in Economic Development<br>Shiri Breznitz<br>&quot;Breznitz makes an important contribution to our understanding of the factors affecting the rise of the entrepreneurial university. Given untapped intellectual, social, and financial capital, the exercise of concerted academic leadership can turn an ivory tower into an engine of local economic development in less than a decade. Read on and discover how.&quot;-Henry Etzkowitz, Institute of Triple Helix Innovation<br>"This book provides two in-depth case studies of the intricacies of technology transfer, the [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-22T12:20:15+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Rachel Shand</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMY-SUSTAINABILITY;65ff8c4f.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMY-SUSTAINABILITY;785880cb.1408">   <title>Fully Funded PhD position </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMY-SUSTAINABILITY;785880cb.1408</link>   <description> PhD Studentship<br>Developing an innovative methodology to facilitate lifecycle supply chain sustainability assessment<br>University of Strathclyde \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Faculty of Engineering<br><br>This is a call for applications for a funded PhD studentship at the Faculty of Engineering, University of Strathclyde, in the area of Supply Chain Sustainability Assessment. The PhD project aim is to develop a methodology for establishing a Lifecycle Supply Chain Indicator, which will be an easy to use metric that will pass information about the lifecycle environmental performance of a product or service from one link of the supply chain to the next one, allowing more informed decision [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-19T15:04:39+01:00</dc:date> rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMY-SUSTAINABILITY;9b4387e1.1407">   <title>The Economics of Travel & Tourism </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMY-SUSTAINABILITY;9b4387e1.1407</link>   <description> Routledge is delighted to bring you a free article and books collection on The Economics of Travel &amp; Tourism.<br><br>Exploring important topics such as the pursuit for sustainable tourism, the growing demand for air travel and the relationship between tourism, trade and growth \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd our collection is free to read for the whole of July 2014.
